alert.note: Alert for Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:29PM MDT until July 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KINGSBURY...EASTERN SANBORN...SOUTHEASTERN BEADLE AND WESTERN MINER COUNTIES... At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Artesian, or 24 miles southeast of Huron, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. At 417 pm CDT a 63 mph wind was reported east of Forestburg by a weather station. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Carthage, Artesian, Forestburg, Fedora and Roswell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Sioux Falls.
